RC_ELIGIBLE.label: Eligible
RC_ELIGIBLE.description: All mandatory checks passed for the evaluated rulebook version.

RC_INELIGIBLE_POLICY.label: Ineligible (policy)
RC_INELIGIBLE_POLICY.description: Rulebook evaluation determined the subject does not meet policy eligibility criteria.
RC_INELIGIBLE_POLICY.remedy_hint: Review eligibility criteria; if criteria were misapplied, file an appeal with supporting evidence.

RC_DATA_MISSING.label: Missing required data
RC_DATA_MISSING.description: A mandatory input fact was missing or unavailable at decision time.
RC_DATA_MISSING.remedy_hint: Provide the missing documentation or request registry correction if the source record is incomplete.

RC_DATA_STALE.label: Stale data used
RC_DATA_STALE.description: Input facts were older than the rulebook freshness window.
RC_DATA_STALE.remedy_hint: Trigger recompute after registry refresh; notify subject if outcome may change.

RC_IDENTITY_UNVERIFIED.label: Identity not verified
RC_IDENTITY_UNVERIFIED.description: Identity proofing level was insufficient for the requested action.
RC_IDENTITY_UNVERIFIED.remedy_hint: Complete the required identity verification step and resubmit.

RC_FRAUD_SIGNAL.label: Fraud signal detected
RC_FRAUD_SIGNAL.description: A fraud or anomaly signal exceeded the configured threshold for review.
RC_FRAUD_SIGNAL.remedy_hint: Escalate to manual review; provide subject an appeal channel if adverse action is taken.

RC_MODEL_LIMITATION.label: Model limitation
RC_MODEL_LIMITATION.description: A known model limitation or fairness constraint prevented automated determination.
RC_MODEL_LIMITATION.remedy_hint: Route to human review or apply alternative rulebook path.

RC_MANUAL_OVERRIDE.label: Manual override applied
RC_MANUAL_OVERRIDE.description: Outcome was produced via authorized human override under governance controls.
RC_MANUAL_OVERRIDE.remedy_hint: Ensure override justification is recorded and auditable.

RC_RATE_LIMITED.label: Rate limited
RC_RATE_LIMITED.description: Service declined request due to rate limiting or abuse protection.
RC_RATE_LIMITED.remedy_hint: Retry after backoff; contact service desk if persistent.

RC_ADDRESS_MISMATCH.label: Address mismatch
RC_ADDRESS_MISMATCH.description: The address facts evaluated did not match the service requirement.
RC_ADDRESS_MISMATCH.remedy_hint: Verify the address registry entry and submit a correction request if needed.

RC_EVIDENCE_INSUFFICIENT.label: Insufficient evidence
RC_EVIDENCE_INSUFFICIENT.description: Submitted evidence was insufficient to approve the requested correction or appeal.
RC_EVIDENCE_INSUFFICIENT.remedy_hint: Submit additional evidence or request an independent review if available.

RC_PRIORITY_ASSIGNED.label: Priority assigned
RC_PRIORITY_ASSIGNED.description: A priority category or rank was assigned based on the rulebook.
RC_PRIORITY_ASSIGNED.remedy_hint: If incorrect, file an appeal with supporting evidence.
